claim: Flublok ensures identical antigenic match with WHO- and FDA-selected flu strains.

verified_evidence.quote: For the 2024-2025 influenza season it is formulated to contain 135 mcg HA per 0.5 mL dose, with 45 mcg HA of each of the following 3 influenza virus strains: A/West Virginia 30 2022 (A/Wisconsin/67/2022 pdm 09 like virus) (H1 N1), A/Massachusetts/18/ 2022 (H3 N2) and B/Austria/1359417/2021.
verified_evidence.explanation: A nearly identical quote appears in the document: 'For the 2024-2025 influenza season it is formulated to contain 135 mcg HA per 0.5 mL dose, with 45 mcg HA of each of the following 3 influenza virus strains: A/West Virginia 30 2022 (A/Wisconsin/67/2022 pdm 09 like virus) (H1 N1), A/Massachusetts/18/ 2022 (H3 N2) and B/Austria/1359417/2021.' The wording and content match the quote to verify, with only minor formatting differences.. The quote directly lists the specific influenza virus strains included in Flublok for the 2024-2025 season, which are the strains selected by health authorities (WHO and FDA) for that season. This demonstrates that Flublok is formulated to match the selected strains, supporting the claim that it ensures an identical antigenic match with WHO- and FDA-selected flu strains.
verified_evidence.presence_explanation: A nearly identical quote appears in the document: 'For the 2024-2025 influenza season it is formulated to contain 135 mcg HA per 0.5 mL dose, with 45 mcg HA of each of the following 3 influenza virus strains: A/West Virginia 30 2022 (A/Wisconsin/67/2022 pdm 09 like virus) (H1 N1), A/Massachusetts/18/ 2022 (H3 N2) and B/Austria/1359417/2021.' The wording and content match the quote to verify, with only minor formatting differences.
verified_evidence.support_explanation: The quote directly lists the specific influenza virus strains included in Flublok for the 2024-2025 season, which are the strains selected by health authorities (WHO and FDA) for that season. This demonstrates that Flublok is formulated to match the selected strains, supporting the claim that it ensures an identical antigenic match with WHO- and FDA-selected flu strains.
verified_evidence.original_relevance: This quote specifies that Flublok is formulated to contain hemagglutinin from the exact strains selected for the 2024-2025 season, demonstrating that it matches the strains chosen by health authorities.

rejected_evidence.quote: Flublok contains recombinant Ha proteins of the three strains of influenza virus specified by health authorities for inclusion in the annual seasonal vaccine.
rejected_evidence.original_explanation: This quote directly states that Flublok contains the hemagglutinin proteins from the three strains of influenza virus that are specified by health authorities (such as WHO and FDA) for the annual vaccine, supporting the claim that Flublok ensures an identical antigenic match with the selected strains.

rejected_evidence.quote: Flublok is standardized according to United States Public Health Service (USPHS) requirements.
rejected_evidence.original_explanation: This quote shows that Flublok is produced to meet the standards set by the USPHS, which includes matching the antigenic composition to the strains selected by the WHO and FDA.
